== Veiloor (CT) (628510) ==

Veiloor (CT) is a town in the [[Thiruvananthapuram ]] taluka of [[Thiruvananthapuram]] district with an area of 13.08 sq. km. and harbouring 5540 households with total population of 22816 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuarm]] is at a distance of 25 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 25 km. Male population is 10548 and female population is 12268. Scheduled Caste population is 4726 and Scheduled Tribes population is 41. Census Location Code of the town is 628510<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 25 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 25 km. Railway station is at Thiruvananthapuram at a distance of 1 km.
